short_summary: Supply of two (2) Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers
description: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Tendering Procedures: Selected tender to all pre-qualified suppliers Competitive Procurement Strategy: Pre-qualified suppliers of the supply arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the applicable category have been invited to submit bids via selected tender. Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: Name of the Requirement – Supply of two (2) Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers Reference Number: 1000252843 Contracting Officer: Eryn Mathers Email: eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca For any questions during the period of August 7 – August 11, 2023 please contact the following procurement officer: Name: Sami Nouh Email: sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca This requirement has been put in place by Health Canada THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES. Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid. As a requirement of the Supply Arrangement, this notice is published on Buy and Sell Canada for a period of 40 calendar days. The closing date published on this notice identifies how long the notice will be published. For the closing date of any solicitation under the supply arrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents. Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated. Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies, at any time. Interested suppliers should download solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement. The responsive bidder already holding a Supply arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award. THE RESPONSIVE BIDDER THAT IS SHORTLISTED FOR CONTRACT AWARD MUST SUBMIT TO TRAVAUX PUBLICS ET SERVICES GOUVERNEMENTAUX CANADA (PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES CANADA) THEIR COMPLIANCE DOCUMENT AND COMPLIANCE FRAUD REPELLENT INITIATIVE DOCUMENT AS ATTACHED TO THIS NOTICE TO EVIDENCE THEIR ELIGIBILITY TO SUBMIT THEIR BID. full_summary:
**Supply of two Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers**
================================================--------

**Contract Information**
------------------------

*   **Contract Number:** 1000252843
*   **Contract Authority:** Health Canada
*   **Procurement Officer:** Eryn Mathers
*   **Email:** [eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca)

**Background**
--------------

This request for proposal is in response to a requirement for the supply of two Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers for Health Canada. Suppliers pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies are invited to participate in this opportunity.

**Requirements**
---------------

The successful bidder will provide two (2) Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers that meet the mandatory technical criteria outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Strategy**
-----------------------

The selected tender will be open to all pre-qualified suppliers of the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.

**Bidder Requirements**
----------------------

Eligible bidders must hold a valid Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Suppliers who wish to be considered for this opportunity should review the solicitation documents available on Buy and Sell Canada and submit a response in accordance with the requirements outlined.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The bidder whose offer conforms to the mandatory technical criteria and has the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

**Deadline**
------------

The deadline for submission of bids is August 24, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Atlantic Time).

You can reach out to [Eryn Mathers](mailto:eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca) or Sami Nouh (sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca during business hours August 7th to 11th if you have any questions or concerns.  

Do not hesitate to reach out to me if you require any additional information. 

Best regards, [Your Name]
